snippet: A commercial on ABC would have cost TerraCycle hundreds of thousands of dollars and only given it 30 seconds of exposure. Instead, the company got more than three minutes, twice in one month. But at what cost?
abstract: A commercial on ABC would have cost TerraCycle hundreds of thousands of dollars and only given it 30 seconds of exposure. Instead, the company got more than three minutes, twice in one month. But at what cost?

headline.main: Maybe There Is Such a Thing as Bad Publicity
